classDiagram
    Customer "1" --> "*" Ticket
    Student "1" --> "1..*" Course
    Galaxy --> "many" Star : Contains
---
┌──────────┐    ┌─────────┐    ┌────────┐     
│ Customer │    │ Student │    │ Galaxy │     
└──────────┘    └─────────┘    └────────┘     
     1│             1│              │         
      │              │          Contains      
      ▼*             ▼ 1..*         ▼ many    
 ┌────────┐     ┌────────┐      ┌──────┐      
 │ Ticket │     │ Course │      │ Star │      
 └────────┘     └────────┘      └──────┘
